Third item: pointer "14:1.1.1.p11". The markdown is "Вулканисты говорили:". Just the start of what the vulcanologists said, but the actual quote isn't provided here. Still, no mention of "Звёздочкин" in this text either.

So the output should have decision "continue", newEvidence empty list. Because none of the current batch items contain the professor's name. Let me confirm once more.

- 12:1.1.1.p9: mentions Знайка, but not Звёздочкин.

- 13:1.1.1.p10: same, Знайкина теория.
